name: FlixTrend 'Vibe' Hoodie
description: Stay cozy while chasing trends with this premium oversized hoodie. Features the FlixTrend logo and a subtle 'Vibe' embroidery.

name: Neon Wave Snapback
description: A stylish snapback cap with a neon wave design inspired by the FlixTrend UI. Perfect for making a statement.

name: Almighty AI Desk Mat
description: Upgrade your setup with this large desk mat featuring our beloved AI companion, Almighty. Smooth surface for gaming and work.

name: Voltix Security Laptop Sleeve
description: Protect your tech with the Voltix Security laptop sleeve. Sleek, padded, and secure, just like our platform.

name: Cyber Pink Tumbler
description: Stay hydrated with this insulated tumbler in FlixTrend's signature Cyber Pink. Keeps your drinks hot or cold for hours.

name: 'Signal' Glow-in-the-Dark Tee
description: A comfortable black t-shirt with the 'Signal' chat icon that glows in the dark. Perfect for late-night vibes.

name: FlixTrend Sticker Pack
description: Decorate your laptop, water bottle, or anything else with this pack of high-quality vinyl stickers featuring logos and icons from the app.

name: Founder's Edition Enamel Pin
description: A limited edition enamel pin to show you were here from the beginning. A must-have for early supporters.
